hero.title: Algeria Academy for Heavy Equipment Operators Training
hero.subtitle: From Simulation to Professionalism
hero.description: Certified training using the latest virtual simulators and real equipment in a safe and monitored environment

publicWorks.title: Public Works and Construction
publicWorks.description: Intensive training on excavation and lifting equipment in complex urban and desert environments.
publicWorks.extraDescription: Dedicated training program for public works equipment: tower cranes, tracked cranes, excavators, bulldozers... Trainees learn control, safety procedures, reading lifting plans, and dealing with complex environments in simulation.

mining.title: Mining and Quarries
mining.description: Handling the giants. Massive equipment requiring extreme precision and high safety awareness.
mining.extraDescription: Training on excavation and extraction equipment: giant excavators, mining trucks, crushers... Focus on: working in hazardous environments, risk analysis, controlling heavy equipment under pressure, and navigating mining sites.

logistics.title: Logistics and Ports
logistics.description: Speed and precision in transporting containers and goods within ports and large warehouses.
logistics.extraDescription: Specialized training in port and warehouse handling equipment

safetyFirst.title: Safety Before Skill
safetyFirst.description: We teach you that the emergency stop button is more important than the control stick.

riskSimulation.title: Risk Simulation
riskSimulation.description: Virtual training on fires, rollovers, and adverse weather conditions.

operatorEthics.title: Operator Ethics
operatorEthics.description: Responsibility, punctuality, and preserving company equipment.

absoluteSafety.title: Absolute Safety
absoluteSafety.description: Zero accident risk. Learn in a controlled and safe environment.

enhancedEfficiency.title: Enhanced Efficiency
enhancedEfficiency.description: Improve your productivity and accuracy through intensive practice.

costReduction.title: Cost Reduction
costReduction.description: Save on fuel consumption, maintenance, and training fees.

q1.question: Is the certificate state-recognized?
q1.answer: Yes, our certificates are accredited and qualify you to work directly in major national and private companies.

q2.question: I have no prior experience, can I enroll?
q2.answer: Absolutely. Our programs are designed to take you from zero to professional.

q3.question: How long is the training?
q3.answer: It varies by specialty, typically ranging from 3 weeks for intensive programs to 3 months for comprehensive training.

q4.question: Do you provide accommodation for trainees from other provinces?
q4.answer: Yes, we have agreements with nearby accommodation centers at affordable rates for trainees.

q5.question: How is practical training conducted?
q5.answer: We start with virtual simulation then move to real equipment in a closed and safe testing field.

step1.title: Registration
step1.description: Submit your administrative file. No high educational level required, the willingness to learn is what matters most.

step2.title: Simulation
step2.description: Learn the basics of driving, arm control, and safety inside a virtual cockpit.

step3.title: Field Application
step3.description: Move to the real machine in the field to reinforce what you learned in simulation.

step4.title: Certification and Employment
step4.description: Obtain a state-accredited diploma and start your professional career in companies.
